item.title: Telepresence as a Service
item.description:
Think of telepresence as the next step beyond the telephone and television: instead of sending your voice or an image, you’re projecting your presence across distances. While not as futuristic as Star Trek’s transporter, it’s a powerful tool for businesses, especially now that companies like Cisco and AT&T offer it as a more accessible service. This shift could mark a significant increase in the use of virtual meetings. Telepresence evolved from video conferencing, which a decade ago was clunky and unreliable...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/telepresence-as-a-service/
